pages.text: The $(item)Orbital Uplink Bracelet$() is used to control $(thing)Orbital Lasers$().$(br)It needs to be charged with $(thing)RF$() and to be configured with $(item)Orbital Laser Patterns$(). The Patterns need to be configured in a $(item)Laser Pattern Controller Terminal$() before they can be used.

The Orbital Uplink comes with multiple controls. The main control key opens the pattern selection. Within the pattern selection the other four directional keys can be used to input a pattern. When the inputted pattern matches a call in sequence of one of the equipped $(item)Orbital Laser Patterns$() a $(item)Target Designator$() will be placed in the users hand.
